name: RacingSceneLive
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to Racing Scene Live's weekly horse racing updates. 
You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests for this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
